title: Hohhot Inner Mongolia City Break with Glamorous Indoor Swimming Pool
description: Discover the capital city of Inner Mongolia when you stay at Crowne Plaza Hohhot City Center, an IHG Hotel, an ultra-modern escape in the heart of the city. Moments between adventures can be spent swimming in the opulent indoor pool, filling your plate at the international buffet all-day dining restaurant or working up a sweat at the fitness centre. When you're ready to unwind, retreat to the spa for a pampering massage, body scrub or facial.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Hohhot City Center, An IHG Hotel
